title: 6.1 Master Challenge 3
question:
Color intensity of red, green and blue is represented by values varying from 0 to 256. Half intensity of a color is represented by a value of 128. Given below are binary representations of these values.

Write the RGB code and color name for the following binary representations of a color. (Hint: Use the Paint application to fi nd the color.)
__language_type_hint: python - sql - htmlcss - javascript - R - pseudocode - java

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
